channel.title: CVE Feed for visualcomposer.com -- Visual Composer Website Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for visualcomposer.com -- Visual Composer Website Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-35653|2024-08-02T03:14:53.594Z -- visualcomposer.com -- visual%20composer%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in visualcomposer.Com Visual Composer Website Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Visual Composer Website Builder: from n/a through 45.8.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in visualcomposer.Com Visual Composer Website Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Visual Composer Website Builder: from n/a through 45.8.0.
